messages.content: And it’s always so uncomfortably awkward when someone says shit like this to you.
As a society we should be ashamed of the fact that this is even a question. Let the suffering stop obviously.
feeling like im not normal and that im shameful and wrong and other people telling me those things are what have done this to me
I'd like to add spontaneously experiencing unending self-loathing because you suddenly remembered that embarrassing thing you did 3 years ago.
I am embarrassed to admit that I was shocked to find out that his books all had the same exact weight and that you knew what that weight was...
Oh no that's so awkward, I don't understand how people don't understand how weird things like that are!
Yah. I unfortunately was sitting and watching this documentary with my Mother. That was very awkward.
I mean, I hope so. I bought his jersey, which would be embarrassing if he was out the league in two years.
Not really cringey. Its not really embarrassing for you i think people might just feel bad upon reading it.
And yet it looks like one thing you can't is read. Shame shame.
You should be embarrassed. Not only because you are a adulterer but because you are a pedo for thinking of your son.
That's a maryland fan comment. You should be ashamed of yourself.
Try nonchalantly handing them your card as if they had dropped it. I think its normal to be shy. *handing on exit, otherwise it could get awkward
Asides from the max number of choices each share, probably being shamed on the internet
Yes, we are going to kink shame you.
Shaming men for trying to solve a problem on their own is actually an example of toxic femininity
I never knew cringing could be so ...cathartic.
Yeah, I always thought [NAME] would be an improved [NAME]. It's a damn shame we haven't thrown to him more often.
She's been fired and shamed out of existence. Good riddance.
Dammit, you know I proof read this and I thought it changed correctly but I guess it didn't.
I'm ugly and able to bump uglies with someone I can make laugh. Mission accomplished.
209 comments and we don’t get to read any? All that good pasta advice going to waste. Shame.
Damn, I really been playing this series all my life...and I ain’t got any regrets.
Its kinda odd,how theres always kinda a war between "Party music" and "Feelings Music"
Lots of internalized rage and mom guilt daily leading to a good shower cry once a week or so.
Ohh, whoops. I still don’t agree but I see my mistake
I have the worst memory ever. Idk if it's from all the weed I smoked but I also have a blank mind like all the time.
Yikes. This kind of freaks me out.
It's a loooong story with some awkward weirdness haha
My nipples are rock hard right now, just ruined my shirt.
